text: @we1p85 @ChrisBEsq @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews He continued hosting rallies, called it the flu, golfed, and disregarded memos and advice from experts. That's what he did. The man is beyond stupid. Ex: thinks antibiotics can be used for viruses. No wonder he appeals to the uneducated masses.
